name: n8n-nodes-base.facebookGraphApi
description: Interacts with Facebook using the Graph API

properties.name: hostUrl
properties.description: The Host URL of the request. Almost all requests are passed to the graph.facebook.com host URL. The single exception is video uploads, which use graph-video.facebook.com.

properties.name: httpRequestMethod
properties.description: The HTTP Method to be used for the request

properties.name: graphApiVersion
properties.description: The version of the Graph API to be used in the request

properties.name: node
properties.description: The node on which to operate. A node is an individual object with a unique ID. For example, there are many User node objects, each with a unique ID representing a person on Facebook.

properties.name: edge
properties.description: Edge of the node on which to operate. Edges represent collections of objects which are attached to the node.

properties.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
properties.description: Whether to connect even if SSL certificate validation is not possible

properties.name: sendBinaryData
properties.description: Whether binary data should be sent as body

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded
properties.description: For Form-Data Multipart, they can be provided in the format: "sendKey1:binaryProperty1,sendKey2:binaryProperty2

properties.description: Trigger will monitor this Figma Team for changes. Team ID can be found in the URL of a Figma Team page when viewed in a web browser: figma.com/files/team/{TEAM-ID}/.

options.name: File Commented
options.description: Triggers when someone comments on a file

options.name: File Deleted
options.description: Triggers whenever a file has been deleted. Does not trigger on all files within a folder, if the folder is deleted.

options.name: File Updated
options.description: Triggers whenever a file saves or is deleted. This occurs whenever a file is closed or within 30 seconds after changes have been made.

options.name: File Version Updated
options.description: Triggers whenever a named version is created in the version history of a file

options.name: Library Publish
options.description: Triggers whenever a library file is published

options.description: Email address of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.

options.description: Triggered when a repository's label is created, edited, or deleted

values.name: cronExpression
values.description:
Use custom cron expression. Values and ranges as follows:
  • Seconds: 0-59
  • Minutes: 0 - 59
  • Hours: 0 - 23
  • Day of Month: 1 - 31
  • Months: 0 - 11 (Jan - Dec)
  • Day of Week: 0 - 6 (Sun - Sat)

values.name: unit
values.description: If it should trigger all X minutes or hours

options.name: fromDateTime
options.description: Returns calls that started on or after the specified date and time. If not provided, list starts with earliest call. For web-conference calls recorded by Gong, the date denotes its scheduled time, otherwise, it denotes its actual start time.

options.name: toDateTime
options.description: Returns calls that started up to but excluding specified date and time. If not provided, list ends with most recent call. For web-conference calls recorded by Gong, the date denotes its scheduled time, otherwise, it denotes its actual start time.

options.name: workspaceId
options.description: Return only the calls belonging to this workspace

options.name: callIds
options.description: List of calls IDs to be filtered
options.hint: Comma separated list of IDs, array of strings can be set in expression

options.name: primaryUserIds
options.description: Return only the calls hosted by the specified user

options.name: createdFromDateTime
options.description: An optional user creation time lower limit, if supplied the API will return only the users created at or after this time

options.name: createdToDateTime
options.description: An optional user creation time upper limit, if supplied the API will return only the users created before this time

options.name: userIds
options.description: Set of Gong's unique numeric identifiers for the users (up to 20 digits)
options.hint: Comma separated list of IDs, array of strings can be set in expression

values.name: batchSize
values.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.

values.name: batchInterval
values.description: Time (in milliseconds) between each batch of requests. 0 for disabled.

options.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
options.description: Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible

options.name: proxy
options.description: HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128

options.name: timeout
options.description: Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
